about_the_game: Intensify your TRON RUN/r experience with this potent bundle of add-on content. Featuring nine new levels of DISC mode, four new STREAM track elements, six new suits: Classic Flynn, Legacy Clu, Legacy Quorra, Rinzler, Beck and  Mara, and three new cycles: Quorra's Light Cycle,the  3rd Generation (Evolution) Cycle, and the 5th Generation (Legacy) Cycle.
detailed_description: Intensify your TRON RUN/r experience with this potent bundle of add-on content. Featuring nine new levels of DISC mode, four new STREAM track elements, six new suits: Classic Flynn, Legacy Clu, Legacy Quorra, Rinzler, Beck and  Mara, and three new cycles: Quorra's Light Cycle,the  3rd Generation (Evolution) Cycle, and the 5th Generation (Legacy) Cycle.
